name: Almost Everything Bagel
description: A cookie rolled in seed mix and topped with cream cheese.

name: Apple Pie
description: A buttery pie cookie topped with apple pie filling and cookie crumbs.

name: Berries & Cream
description: Creamy, smooth banana pudding stuffed into a buttery pie crust and topped with a vanilla wafer.

name: Birthday Cake (Holiday)
description: A holiday version of Crumbl’s Birthday Cake Cookie. This version features a cake batter cookie with vanilla cream cheese frosting and holiday sprinkles.

name: Birthday Cake ft. Oreo
description: A chocolate Oreo-filled cookie topped with birthday cake frosting, Oreo cake balls, and sprinkles.

name: Caramel Popcorn
description: A buttery cookie topped with thick caramel frosting, crunchy caramel popcorn, and smooth caramel.

name: Caramel Pumpkin
description: A pumpkin cookie with caramel cream cheese frosting and sprinkle of pumpkin pie spice.

name: Caramel Shortbread Featuring Twix®
description: A sugar cookie filled with TWIX® pieces and topped with caramel, milk chocolate, and more TWIX® pieces.

name: Cereal Milk ft. Fruity Pebbles
description: A cereal milk-flavored sugar cookie brushed with a milky glaze and rolled with crunchy Fruity Pebbles cereal.

name: Chocolate ft. Reese’s Puffs
description: A chilled chocolate cookie with milk chocolate chips, topped with a creamy peanut butter frosting and crunchy Reese’s Puffs Cereal pieces.

name: Chocolate Potato Chip
description: A savory cookie filled with semi-sweet chocolate chunks and toasted coconut rolled in crushed potato chips and pretzels.

name: Churro
description: A crisp cookie rolled in cinnamon sugar and topped with a swirl of cinnamon buttercream frosting and a sprinkle of cinnamon sugar.

name: Cinnamon Toast Crunch
description: A cinnamon sugar cookie topped with a vanilla cream cheese glaze, crushed Cinnamon Toast Crunch cereal, and a sprinkle of cinnamon sugar.

name: Pink Sugar
description: A vanilla sugar cookie topped with a perfect pink swoop of real almond frosting with real almond extract. This new version was introduced in August 2022 and will be part of the recurring weekly menu.

name: Coconut White Chip
description: Packed with creamy white chips and rolled in toasted shredded coconut, all you need is one bite to be transported to a tropical paradise.

name: Confetti Cake
description: A sugar cookie topped with pink vanilla cream cheese frosting and confetti sprinkles.

name: Cookies & Cream
description: A marbling of chocolate cookies and creamy white chocolate chips—not just dessert, it’s art.

name: Cornbread
description: A cornbread cookie with honey butter glaze, a scoop of honey buttercream, and a drizzle of honey.

name: Cotton Candy
description: Cotton candy cream cheese frosting topped with a sprinkle of cotton candy pop rocks.

name: Dark Dream
description: Chocolate cookie with plenty of semi-sweet chocolate chips inside and out.

name: Dirt Cake
description: A warm chocolate cookie coated in cookies & cream crumbs, topped with a rich fudge chocolate frosting, crunchy chocolate streusel, and a gummy worm.

name: Double Trouble
description: Semi-sweet chocolate chip cookie and a rich chocolate cookie baked together in perfect harmony.

name: Fried Ice Cream
description: A cinnamon cookie, white chocolate buttercream, fried ice cream streusel.

name: Galaxy Brownie
description: Chocolate brownie cookie, fudge glaze, and candy bits.

name: Gingersnap
description: A cookie filled with the holiday flavors of molasses, brown sugar, cinnamon, and ginger and topped with sugar crystals.

name: Hazelnut Sea Salt
description: A browned butter cookie stuffed and topped with hazelnut spread and sea salt.

name: Honey Bun
description: A cinnamon cookie with honey butter glaze.

name: Lemon Blackberry
description: A chilled lemon poppy seed cookie topped with marbled lemon poppy seed and blackberry frostings.

name: Lemon Glaze
description: A lemon cookie with lemon glaze and a fresh slice of lemon.

name: Midnight Mint
description: A chocolate cookie filled with both green mint chips and semi-sweet chocolate chips.

name: Mint Chip Ice Cream
description: A chilled sugar cookie with mini semi-sweet chips, a refreshing mint mousse, and a dollop of whipped cream.

name: Molten Lava
description: A sumptuous dark chocolate cookie oozing with hot fudge and sprinkled with powdered sugar.

name: Mom’s Recipe
description: A chunky oatmeal cookie packed with semi-sweet chocolate, toffee, and peanut butter chips all sprinkled with a dash of sea salt.

name: Monster
description: A warm peanut butter oatmeal cookie with M&M’s, creamy peanut butter chips, rich semi-sweet chocolate chunks and brown sugar.

name: Original ft. Lucky Charms®
description: Rich with white chocolate chips, vanilla marshmallow frosting, and Lucky Charms marshmallows sprinkled on top.

name: Peanut Butter Cookies & Cream
description: The smoothness of chocolate and peanut butter with the sweet crunch of cookies and cream bits.

name: Peanut Butter Cup ft. Reese's
description: A peanut butter cookie filled with chunks of REESE’S® Peanut Butter Cups, topped with melted peanut butter and more chopped REESE’S® Peanut Butter Cups.

name: Peanut Butter Munch ft. Muddy Buddies™
description: A peanut butter cookie with melted milk chocolate and Muddy Buddies™ pieces.

name: Peanut Butter ft. Snickers®
description: Peanut butter cookie with vanilla glaze topped with Snickers® pieces and a drizzle of milk chocolate.

name: Peppermint Bark
description: A peppermint-infused chocolate cookie covered in a pool of melty white chocolate and a sprinkle of crushed candy cane.

name: Piña Colada
description: A pineapple coconut cookie layered with piña colada frosting then finished with sprinkled coconut and a bright red cherry.

name: Pineapple Whip
description: A chilled pineapple sugar cookie with a swirl of thick pineapple-flavored whipped topping.

name: Pumpkin Pie
description: A pie crust cookie with spiced pumpkin pie filling and a dollop of whipped cream.

name: Red Velvet Cupcake
description: Red velvet cookie with cream cheese frosting and crumbs on top.

name: Red Velvet White Chip
description: A dark red velvet cookie loaded with gooey white chips.

name: Rocky Road
description: Chocolate cookie with marshmallow filling and topped with chocolate chips and almonds.

name: S'mores
description: A chewy graham cracker cookie packed with milk chocolate chips, topped with toasted marshmallows and drizzled with chocolate and buttery graham cracker crumbs.

name: Raspberry Lime ft. Sour Patch Kids
description: A lime-infused sugar cookie base filled with Sour Patch Kids candy pieces, a sweet raspberry sour patch filling, and topped with a tart lime frosting and a Sour Patch Kids candy.

name: Sticky Bun
description: A butter-vanilla sugar cookie filled with cinnamon roll filling and topped with butterscotch caramel topping, finished with a sprinkle of pecans.

name: Sugar – Pumpkin Candy
description: A chilled vanilla sugar cookie with sweet vanilla buttercream frosting and a festive candy pumpkin on top.

name: Sugar Featuring Mother’s® Eerie Critters™ Cookies
description: A sugar cookie freckled with Halloween sprinkles, topped with a layer of creamy melted white chips and finished with a Halloween Mother’s Original Circus Animal Cookie.

name: Sugar ft. Mothers Valentine X’s and O’s
description: A sugar cookie topped with a layer of melted white chips, sprinkles, and Mother’s X’s & O’s Valentine’s Day Cookies.

name: Sugar ft. Twix
description: A buttery sugar cookie base filled with chopped Twix and topped with a gooey layer of caramel, a chilly layer of sweet milk chocolate, and a real Mini Twix.

name: Triple Chocolate Chip
description: Chocolate cookie is packed with semi-sweet chunks, creamy white chips, and thick milk chocolate chips.

name: Turtle
description: A chilled dark chocolate cookie rolled in finely chopped pecans topped with a scoop of caramel, a scoop of melted milk chocolate, and a sprinkle of pecans.

name: Vanilla Crumb Cake ft. Golden OREO®
description: This cookie is made with Golden OREO® crumbs and topped with vanilla cream cheese frosting and a sprinkle of Golden OREO® crumbs.

name: Waffle
description: A waffle cookie smothered with maple syrup and a dollop of buttercream frosting.
